includedAssets.title: Box Cutter
includedAssets.synopsis: A paranoid Saul hires a bodyguard, while Walt and Jesse anxiously await Gus's reaction to Gale's murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A paranoid Saul hires a bodyguard, while Walt and Jesse anxiously await Gus's reaction to Gale's murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A paranoid Saul hires a bodyguard, while Walt and Jesse anxiously await Gus's reaction to Gale's murder.

includedAssets.title: Thirty-Eight Snub
includedAssets.synopsis: As Walt grows ever more fearful of Gus, Hank pushes Marie away and Skyler attempts to buy a car wash.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Walt grows ever more fearful of Gus, Hank pushes Marie away and Skyler attempts to buy a car wash.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Walt grows ever more fearful of Gus, Hank pushes Marie away and Skyler attempts to buy a car wash.

includedAssets.title: Open House
includedAssets.synopsis: Skyler convinces Walt to buy the car wash. Meanwhile, Jesse flies further off the rails, throwing a wild party with Badger and Skinny Pete.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Skyler convinces Walt to buy the car wash. Meanwhile, Jesse flies further off the rails, throwing a wild party with Badger and Skinny Pete.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Skyler convinces Walt to buy the car wash. Meanwhile, Jesse flies further off the rails, throwing a wild party with Badger and Skinny Pete.

includedAssets.title: Bullet Points
includedAssets.synopsis: Skyler and Walt devise a plan to explain their purchase of the car wash, Jesse is the victim of an expensive robbery and Hank comes to Walt with a breakthrough.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Skyler and Walt devise a plan to explain their purchase of the car wash, while Jesse is the victim of an expensive robbery.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Skyler and Walt devise a plan to explain their purchase of the car wash, Jesse is the victim of an expensive robbery and Hank comes to Walt with a breakthrough.

includedAssets.title: Shotgun
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike brings Jesse along on a job. Meanwhile, Skyler softens towards Walt, but later his hubris gets the better of him in a conversation with Hank.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike brings Jesse along on a job. Meanwhile, Skyler softens towards Walt, but later his hubris gets the better of him in a conversation with Hank.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mike brings Jesse along on a job. Meanwhile, Skyler softens towards Walt, but later his hubris gets the better of him in a conversation with Hank.

includedAssets.title: Cornered
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt angers Skyler when he buys Walt Jr a new car. Meanwhile, Walt suspects Gus of driving a wedge between him and Jesse.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt angers Skyler when he buys Walt Jr a new car. Meanwhile, Walt suspects Gus of driving a wedge between him and Jesse.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt angers Skyler when he buys Walt Jr a new car. Meanwhile, Walt suspects Gus of driving a wedge between him and Jesse.

includedAssets.title: Problem Dog
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt tries to persuade Jesse to get rid of Gus once and for all.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt tries to persuade Jesse to get rid of Gus once and for all.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt tries to persuade Jesse to get rid of Gus once and for all.

includedAssets.title: Hermanos
includedAssets.synopsis: As Hank and the DEA close in on Gus, Walt urges Jesse to dispatch him before it's too late.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Hank and the DEA close in on Gus, Walt urges Jesse to dispatch him before it's too late.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Hank and the DEA close in on Gus, Walt urges Jesse to dispatch him before it's too late.

includedAssets.title: Bug
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse is called in to cover tracks after Hank uncovers Gus's depot. Meanwhile, Ted tells Skyler he is being audited.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse is called in to cover tracks after Hank uncovers Gus's depot. Meanwhile, Ted tells Skyler he is being audited.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse is called in to cover tracks after Hank uncovers Gus's depot. Meanwhile, Ted tells Skyler he is being audited.

includedAssets.title: Salud
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse, Mike and Gus go to the cartel's lab in Mexico, where Jesse impresses with a cook. Plus, Skyler gives Ted the money to pay off his back taxes.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse, Mike and Gus go to the cartel's lab in Mexico, where Jesse impresses with a cook. Plus, Skyler gives Ted the money to pay off his back taxes.

includedAssets.title: Crawl Space
includedAssets.synopsis: As Gus passes leadership of the lab to Jesse, Walt prepares to flee with the family. Meanwhile, Ted refuses to use Skyler's money for his taxes.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Gus passes leadership of the lab to Jesse, Walt prepares to flee with the family. Meanwhile, Ted refuses to use Skyler's money for his taxes.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Gus passes leadership of the lab to Jesse, Walt prepares to flee with the family. Meanwhile, Ted refuses to use Skyler's money for his taxes.

includedAssets.title: End Times
includedAssets.synopsis: The Whites go into DEA protection. Meanwhile, Andrea calls Jesse when her son comes down with a mysterious illness - could Gus be behind it?

includedAssets.title: Face Off
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt involves Hector in a plan to kill Gus, while the police question Jesse about Brock.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt involves Hector in a plan to kill Gus, while the police question Jesse about Brock.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt involves Hector in a plan to kill Gus, while the police question Jesse about Brock.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Hank continues to struggle with his recovery, but begins to uncover some valuable pieces of the puzzle in season four of the acclaimed drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hank continues to struggle with his recovery, but begins to uncover some valuable pieces of the puzzle in season four of the acclaimed drama.

includedIn.title: Breaking Bad
includedIn.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A mild-mannered chemistry teacher turns his talents to cooking meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
